en: And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
hmr: LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,

en: Command the children of Israel, and say unto them, My oblation, my food for my offerings made by fire, of a sweet savor unto me, shall ye observe to offer unto me in their due season.
hmr: “Israel thlahai chu thu pe la, an kuomah, ‘Ka bu ka ta dinga riminhnik meia thilinhlân, ka kuoma thilinhlân chu a hun tak peiah in inhlân ding a nih,’ ti la.

en: And thou shalt say unto them, This is the offering made by fire which ye shall offer unto Jehovah: he-lambs a year old without blemish, two day by day, for a continual burnt-offering.
hmr: Chun, an kuomah hril rawh: ‘Hi hi meia thilinhlân LALPA kuoma in inhlân ding chu a nih: berâmte a chal kum khat mi demkailo ni tin pahni, pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlân hrim dingin.

en: The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at even;
hmr: Berâmte pakhat chu zîngkâr inhlân in ta, pakhat chu zântieng inhlân in tih;

en: and the tenth part of an ephah of fine flour for a meal-offering, mingled with the fourth part of a hin of beaten oil.
hmr: beiphit thilinhlâna dingin bei- phit indi mi epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat chawkpawl leh.

en: It is a continual burnt-offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet savor, an offering made by fire unto Jehovah.
hmr: LALPA ta dinga meia thilinhlân riminhnika dingin Sinai tlânga ruot pumrawhmang thilinhlân hrim kha a nih.

en: And the drink-offering thereof shall be the fourth part of a hin for the one lamb: in the holy place shalt thou pour out a drink-offering of strong drink unto Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, Berâmte pakhat inhlân- naa dâwnmi thilinhlân chu, hin hmun lia ṭhea hmun khat a ni ding a nih; LALPA ta dinga uoin, dâwn ding thilinhlân chu hmun inthiengah i bun suok ding a nih.

en: And the other lamb shalt thou offer at even: as the meal-offering of the morning, and as the drink-offering thereof, thou shalt offer it, an offering made by fire, of a sweet savor unto Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, berâmte pakhat chu zân- tieng în hlân ding a nih; Zântienga beiphit thilinhlân ang le chutaka dâwnmi thilinhlân ang bawk chu LALPA ta dinga riminhnika dinga meia thilinhlân chu în hlân ding a nih.

en: And on the sabbath day two he-lambs a year old without blemish, and two tenth parts of an ephah of fine flour for a meal-offering, mingled with oil, and the drink-offering thereof:
hmr: “Chun, châwlniin berâmte, a chal kum khat mi, demkailo pahni le bei- phit thilinhlâna dingin beiphit indi mi epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun hni hrieka chawkpawl le chutaka dâwn- mi thilinhlân leh în hlân ding a nih;

en: this is the burnt-offering of every sabbath, besides the continual burnt-offering, and the drink-offering thereof.
hmr: hi hi châwlni poa pumraw- hmang thilinhlân inhlân zing le chu- taka dâwnmi thilinhlân bâka pum- rawhmang thilinhlân inhlân ding chu a nih.

en: And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt-offering unto Jehovah: two young bullocks, and one ram, seven he-lambs a year old without blemish;
hmr: In thla thar taphawtah LALPA ta ding pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlân ding a nih; bâwngchal tuoi pahni le berâmchal pakhat kum khat mi demkailo pasari;

en: and three tenth parts of an ephah of fine flour for a meal-offering, mingled with oil, for each bullock; and two tenth parts of fine flour for a meal-offering, mingled with oil, for the one ram;
hmr: chun, bâwngchal tina chun beiphit thilinhlân dingin beiphit indi mi hrieka chawkpawl epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun thum; chun, berâm pakhatah beiphit thilinhlânah beiphit indi mi, hrieka chawkpawl hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun hni;

en: and a tenth part of fine flour mingled with oil for a meal-offering unto every lamb; for a burnt-offering of a sweet savor, an offering made by fire unto Jehovah.
hmr: chun, berâmte tinah beiphit thilinhlâna dingin beiphit indi mi hrieka chawkpawl hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat; hi hi pumrawhmang thilinhlân riminhnik LALPA ta dinga meia thilinhlân a nih.

en: And their drink-offerings shall be half a hin of wine for a bullock, and the third part of a hin for the ram, and the fourth part of a hin for a lamb: this is the burnt-offering of every month throughout the months of the year.
hmr: Chun, an dâwnmi thilinhlân chu bâwngchal pakhatah uoin hin chenve nîng a tih; berâmchal pakhat- ah hin hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat, berâmte pakhatah hin hmun lia ṭhea hmun khat; hi hi kum tluona thla tina pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu a nih.

en: And one he-goat for a sin-offering unto Jehovah; it shall be offered besides the continual burnt-offering, and the drink-offering thereof.
hmr: Chun, LALPA kuomah suol thawina dingin kêlchal pakhat in- hlân ding a nih; pumrawhmang thilinhlâna inhlân hrim le chutaka dâwnmi thil inhlân bâkah.

en: And in the first month, on the fourteenth day of the month, is Jehovah’s passover.
hmr: “Chun, thla khatna ni sâwmpali ni chu LALPA Fekân ruoiṭhe ni a na.

en: And on the fifteenth day of this month shall be a feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.
hmr: Chu thla ni sâwmpanga ni chu ruoiṭhe ni nîng a ta; ni sari sûng chu chawlṭhanglo bei fâk ding nîng a tih.

en: In the first day shall be a holy convocation: ye shall do no servile work;
hmr: Ni khat ni chun inkhâwmpui inthieng um a ta, ieng sin khawm in thaw ding a ni nawh a;

en: but ye shall offer an offering made by fire, a burnt-offering unto Jehovah: two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven he-lambs a year old; they shall be unto you without blemish;
hmr: meia thilinhlân pumrawhmang thilinhlân ruok chu LALPA kuomah in inhlân ding a nih; bâwngchal tuoi pahni le berâmchal pakhat le berâmte a chal kum khat mi pasari, demkailo a ni ngei ding a nih;

en: and their meal-offering, fine flour mingled with oil: three tenth parts shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth parts for the ram;
hmr: beiphit indi mi hrieka chawk- pawl, an beiphit thilinhlân leh; bâwngchal pakhatah epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun thum, berâmchal pakhatah hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun hni;

en: a tenth part shalt thou offer for every lamb of the seven lambs;
hmr: berâmte pasaria chun hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat seng a ni ding a nih;

en: and one he-goat for a sin-offering, to make atonement for you.
hmr: chun, in ta dinga inremna siemna dingin suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat.

en: Ye shall offer these besides the burnt-offering of the morning, which is for a continual burnt-offering.
hmr: Hienghi zîngkâra pumraw- hmang thilinhlân, pumrawhmang thilinhlân hrim bâkah in inhlân ding a nih.

en: After this manner ye shall offer daily, for seven days, the food of the offering made by fire, of a sweet savor unto Jehovah: it shall be offered besides the continual burnt-offering, and the drink-offering thereof.
hmr: Hienghin LALPA ta dinga riminhnik meia thilinhlân fâk ding ni tin, ni sari sûng inhlân ding a nih; pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlân zing le chutaka dâwnmi thilinhlân bâkah.

en: And on the seventh day ye shall have a holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work.
hmr: A ni sari ni chun inkhawmpui inthieng nei in ta, ieng sin khawm in thaw ding a ni nawh.

en: Also in the day of the first-fruits, when ye offer a new meal-offering unto Jehovah in your feast of weeks, ye shall have a holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work;
hmr: “In Châwlni kâr ruoiṭhe, in bu thar tîr ruoiṭhe LALPA ta dinga thil thar beiphit thilinhlân inhlân ni khawma inkhawmpui inthieng nei in ta; ieng sin khawm in thaw ding a ni nawh a;

en: but ye shall offer a burnt-offering for a sweet savor unto Jehovah: two young bullocks, one ram, seven he-lambs a year old;
hmr: LALPA ta dinga riminhnik inhlân ruok chu in inhlân ding a nih; bâwngchal tuoi pahni, berâmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pasari;

en: and their meal-offering, fine flour mingled with oil, three tenth parts for each bullock, two tenth parts for the one ram,
hmr: an beiphit thilinhlân, beiphit indi mi hrieka chawkpawl, bâwng- chal pakhatah epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun thum, berâmchal pakhat- ah hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun hni,

en: a tenth part for every lamb of the seven lambs;
hmr: berâmte pasaria chun hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat seng;

en: one he-goat, to make atonement for you.
hmr: in ta dinga inremna siemna dingin kêlchal pakhat leh.

en: Besides the continual burnt-offering, and the meal-offering thereof, ye shall offer them (they shall be unto you without blemish), and their drink-offerings.
hmr: (Demkailo an ni ngei ding a nih). Pumrawhmang thilinhlân le dâwn ding thilinhlân zing le chutaka beiphit thilinhlân le dâwnmi thilin- hlân bâkah inhlân ding a nih.
